transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sanju Mahajan ji baat kar rahe hain aapke Mahajan export se?
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Sir main Satyajit Tiwari bol raha tha IndiaMART ke Noida head office se business manager baat kar raha tha. Sir aapki ek mail aayi thi hamare paas mein.
Customer: Already Pragati ke saath baat ho rahi hai. Haan haan bilkul bilkul. Bola hai ki mere se baat karein phone call pe.
Executive: Sir do minute time lunga zyada nahi kyuki actually sir mail pe saari cheezein matlab main nahi us way mein samjha paunga jis way mein main aapse call pe baat kar lunga. Do minute baki mail pe hi jayega jo bhi aage further communication hai na.
Executive: Main keh raha tha sir ki aapki do request thi usme do aapne us pe discussion kiya. Ek to ye tha ki last year sir aapne 56886 diya tha including GST two year ke liye right?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To sir last year mein jis samay pe sir aapne liya tha us samay ka price aur us samay ke offer discount ke wajah se sir definitely aapko ek kaafi kam mein mila tha. Us samay bhi hamare actual price nahi the lekin sir is samay two year aur three years ke dono ke sir price increase kar gaye. Is samay agar aap two year wala sir agar chahte ho ki match kare sir to wo three years ke price mein match karega kyuki two years ka sir price already kaafi increase kar chuka. Us samay bhi tha lekin us samay bhi aapke special approvals ke wajah se discount lage the jahan se ki ye mil paya tha.
Executive: Dusri cheez sir agar do saal mein agar jaate hain to do saal mein sir 70 plus GST pe 5% ka discount hi maximum hum consider kar sakte hain aur agar three years mein jaate hain to 84000 plus GST sir matlab wo last year pe koi discounts nahi hai. To teen saal wala price agar do saal wale sir price ke accordingly aap dekhe to teen saal wala aapke liye feasible padega. Do saal wale mein sir sab.
Customer: Karne ki koi zarurat nahi hai phone pe aap email pe apna offer kar dijiye main jawab dunga.
Executive: Theek hai. Aur sir ye renewal hai aap apni choice se jab bhi karna ho kar sakte hain. Pehle karne ka kuch discounts mil jaata hai baki aapki choice hai aap apne last date tak kar sakte hain lekin agar pehle karte hain to discounts sir milte hain bas ye update dena tha theek hai?
Customer: Aapki actually pehle karne pe na humesha team confuse hi rehti hai ki hamara contract kab se chal raha hai.
Executive: Nahi last date se hi badhega sir. confusion hi rehti hai kab se chal raha hai. se dekhte hain sir usko.
Executive: Main bata deta hu.
Customer: Hame confusion nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Aapki choice hai aapki jo service chalegi 19th of December 2025 se 26 27 tak chalegi. Haan do saal pe is samay karne pe ek months extra company offer kar rahi hai agar abhi karte hain aur teen saal pe do mahine extra company offer kar rahi hai. Agar do saal mein jaate hain to ye aapka 19 December se badh ke 19 January ho jayega aur agar do mahine teen saal wale mein jaate hain to 19 February tak ye service aapki extend ho jayegi. Agar aap abhi karte hain to ye offer chal raha hai currently.
Customer: Theek hai aap email pe likh sakte hain.
Executive: Main email kar deta hu baki jo concern tha sir ye main aapka close kar deta hu baki mail pe hamara communication chalta rahega. Ek updates tha jo mujhe dena tha aapko to wo maine de diya baki mail pe jo bhi hoga sir communication chalta rahega aur main bhi apne aap ko bol deta hu ki mere ko bhi wo loop kar denge Pragati.
Customer: Koi update nahi mila hai mere ko jo bhi update chahiye wo email pe chahiye mere ko phone call pe baat nahi karni hai kisi bande se har bari koi naya banda baat karta hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Thank you.
Executive: Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants price matching for subscription renewal.

- Prefers communication via email, not phone calls.



Resolution:

- Explained pricing differences due to offer periods.

- Provided details on current renewal offers.

- Agreed to send the offer details via email.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send offer details via email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, renewal, pricing, email communication
